articles.title: The Patriots rebuild is going to take a while, but did we underestimate just how long it will be, and other thoughts on Week 1
articles.description:
The Patriots began the Mike Vrabel coaching era with the reasonable promise of better days ahead. But his debut Sunday, a 20-13 loss to Pete Carroll and the Raiders, was not one of those better days.

The post The Patriots rebuild is going to take a while, but did we underestimate just how long it will be, and other thoughts on Week 1 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots lost 20-13 to the Raiders in Mike Vrabel's coaching debut on September 8.
Fans may face a prolonged rebuilding phase as the team adjusts to new leadership.
Local businesses could see reduced game-day traffic due to the team's struggling performance.
